description: This file defines routing configurations, route classes, and navigation logic for a Flutter TV application, including route definitions, a router delegate, route information parser, and placeholder screens.

classes.name: AppRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages the navigation stack for the TV app, updating pages based on route path.

classes.name: AppRouteInformationParser
classes.description: Parses route information from URIs or strings and restores route information.

classes.name: AppNavigator
classes.description: Provides a simple interface to navigate between routes programmatically.

classes.name: DetailsScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the details page, displaying passed arguments.

classes.name: SettingsScreen
classes.description: Placeholder widget for the settings page.

methods.name: buildRouter
methods.description: Builds the RouterConfig object with delegate and parser.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Updates the route based on new route information.

methods.name: _setPath
methods.description: Internal method to set the current route path and optional arguments.

methods.name: parseRouteInformation
methods.description: Extracts route path from RouteInformation object.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Navigates to a specified route path with optional arguments.
